actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of any right, title, or interest which the United States may have in certain real property in the State of Arizona to the current owners of record.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey without consideration to the owners of record any interest, including mineral rights, of the United States in specified lands in Pima County, Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of any right, title, or interest which the United States may have in certain real property in the State of Arizona to the current owners of record.
